cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and I come out at night! What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I twinkle in the sky
😴 You see me when you are sleeping
💡 I am far, far away

cosmos.question: I am round and you live on me. I have water and land. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 You have a house here.
🌱 Plants grow on me
🌎 I am the third planet from the sun.

cosmos.question: I am bright and hot, and I give the Earth light. What am I?

hints.text: 🌞 I appear during the day.
🔥 I am a giant ball of fire.
😎 You need sunglasses to look at me.

cosmos.question: I go around the Earth, and you can see me at night. I change shape! What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Sometimes I am round, sometimes I am not.
🐺 Wolves howl at me.
🧀 Some people say I am made of cheese!

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Some of me are named after animals.
✨ You can find me by connecting the dots.
🔭 People use telescopes to see me better.

cosmos.question: I'm a giant family of stars, gas, and dust, held together by gravity. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 I can be spiral-shaped or round.
✨ Our sun lives in one of me
🌌 I'm much bigger than a solar system!

cosmos.question: I am a giant ball of gas that gives off light and heat. I am much bigger than Earth! What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am made mostly of hydrogen and helium.
✨ I twinkle, but planets don't!
🌞 Our sun is one of me.

cosmos.question: I am a small, icy body that flies through space and sometimes has a tail. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I am often called a 'dirty snowball'.
☀️ My tail always points away from the sun.
💫 You might see me only once in your life!

cosmos.question: I'm a force that pulls everything together, keeping planets around the sun. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 An apple falling from a tree shows how I work on Earth.
🌍 It's what keeps you from floating into space!
⚖️ The bigger something is, the stronger I pull.

cosmos.question: I am a group of planets that orbit a star. Earth is part of me! What am I called?

hints.text: 🪐 I include the Sun and all the planets that go around it.
🛰️ Spacecrafts have explored some of my planets.
🌎 We live in me.

transport.question: I have wheels and go on the road. People ride inside me. What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 I am bigger than a scooter.
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Many people can fit inside me.
🚦 I stop at red lights.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and have wings. Birds don't like being near me. What am I?

hints.text: ✈️ I am much bigger than a bird.
🌎 I can take you to far away places.
☁️ I fly above the clouds.

transport.question: I go on tracks and can carry lots of people. Choo choo!

hints.text: 🚂 I am very long.
🚏I stop at stations.
🧑‍✈️A conductor helps me.

transport.question: I float on the water and help you cross the sea. I'm bigger than a raft.

hints.text: 🌊 I need water to move.
⚓ I have a big anchor.
🚢 Pirates may have used me a long time ago.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal with your feet. You can ring my bell!

hints.text: 🚴 You have to balance when riding me.
🔔 I have a bell to warn people.
👧 You can ride me in the park.

transport.question: I am a car that is yellow and picks people up. I have a meter running

hints.text: 🚕 I am often in a city.
🚦 You can wave to call me
💰 You pay for the ride.

transport.question: I help firefighters get to emergencies quickly. I have a loud siren.

hints.text: 🚨 I am red and shiny.
🔥 I help put out fires.
🐕‍🦺 I might have a dalmatian with me.

transport.question: I travel under the sea. You can look out and see fish!

hints.text: 🔦 I have a periscope.
🐟 I can go very deep.
🌊 I don't need sails or paddles.

transport.question: I carry things, but not people. I'm big and strong, and you see me on the road.

hints.text: 📦 I deliver important things.
🚛 I'm bigger than a car.
🛣️ I drive long distances.

transport.question: I go to space and explore new planets. I am very fast and powerful.

hints.text: 👩‍🚀 I take astronauts to space.
🚀 I am faster than an airplane.
🪐 I can travel to the moon and beyond.
